alert.note: Alert for Lamoille (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 18 at 3:17AM EST until December 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches. * WHERE...In Vermont, Lamoille County. In New York, Western Clinton and Western Essex Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop across the region from south to north beginning around noon or shortly before, then become briefly heavy at times into the early overnight hours before ending around sunrise Sunday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
